tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_rotation_schedule (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   rotation_number INT NOT NULL,
   last_rotated_date DATE NOT NULL,
   next_rotation_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE soil_health_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    soil_ph FLOAT,
    soil_moisture FLOAT,
    soil_nutrients JSON
);

CREATE TABLE field_rotation (
  rotation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  crop_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  rotation_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES field_information(field_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES rotation_crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_rotation_schedule (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  planting_date DATE NOT NULL,
  harvest_date DATE NOT NULL,
  soil_condition TEXT,
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE soil_health (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  soil_sample_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  nitrogen_level FLOAT,
  phosphorus_level FLOAT,
  potassium_level FLOAT,
  pH_level FLOAT,
  organic_matter FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_types (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  optimal_ph FLOAT,
  water_requirements VARCHAR(100),
  nutrients_required TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE field_conditions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  size INTEGER,
  soil_type VARCHAR(50),
  drainage_system VARCHAR(50),
  previous_crop VARCHAR(50)
);
